channel.title: Jewish Roots of Christianity
channel.itunes:description: The fact that Christianity was born from Judaism is well known. Less know is exactly where we differ on key concepts - such as the Messiah. Rabbi Spiro elaborates on failed and false Messiahs. Also hear how the Roman Empire fostered a super fertile environment for Christianity to take root.
channel.itunes:author: Rabbi Ken Spiro
